first of all i have played another 10 hours of them ac version so don't complain about me playing the game for 1.5 hours  Motorbike is a nice casual motorbike sim but has a couple of problems  1. when making your own levels sometimes ramps and stuff can randomly become invisible 2. no fullscreen 3. some frame stuttering  overall with a simple patch this game could be one of the best motorbike games on steam plus it's 5 bucks 7.5/10

Game needs work. No option to change controls, controls screen doesn't stay on long enough to read everything. Physics seems a bit off, especially the reverse gear power. This game wasn't for me sadly.
